info.name: Facebook Ano
info.description: Remake the style sheet for Facebook Web. Just focus to post content, ignore profile name and avatar of friends and who you followed.
info.additionalInfo: v1.0 - Changed name of friends in news feed, comments, sub-comments, chat bar to @nonymous - Highlight Facebook tracked links by orange. - Changed inherit font to make clear content for all languages (I used Noto Sans, Open Sans, Roboto Sans). - Disabled transition effects. - Hidden suggestion box. - Hidden image white box in intro profile part. - Improved spacing problem item in friend list/follow list.
